text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Budʹte pomichnykamy Allaha, yak skazav Isa, syn Marʺyam, uchnyam svoyim: «Khto moyi pomichnyky na shlyakhu do Allaha?» Skazaly uchni: «My — pomichnyky Allaha». I uviruvala chastyna sered syniv Israyilya, a insha chastyna ne uviruvala. Pidtrymaly My tykh, yaki uviruvaly, i peremohly vony vorohiv svoyikh
